statements: SELECT * FROM competitor_data ORDER BY competitor_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, revenue FROM competitor_data WHERE market_share > 10;
SELECT competitor_name, revenue, market_share FROM competitor_data WHERE revenue < 5000;
SELECT id, competitor_name FROM competitor_data WHERE market_share > 20 ORDER BY revenue ASC;
SELECT * FROM competitor_data WHERE competitor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT competitor_name, product_name, revenue FROM competitor_data WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY competitor_name ASC, revenue DESC
SELECT product_name, market_share FROM competitor_data WHERE market_share > 10 ORDER BY market_share ASC, product_name DESC
SELECT competitor_name, product_name, revenue, market_share FROM competitor_data WHERE revenue > 5000 AND market_share < 20 ORDER BY revenue DESC, market_share ASC
SELECT * FROM competitor_data WHERE competitor_name LIKE '%Tech%' OR product_name LIKE '%Gadget%' ORDER BY competitor_name ASC, product_name ASC
SELECT competitor_name, product_name, revenue, market_share FROM competitor_data WHERE competitor_name = 'Apple Inc' OR competitor_name = 'Samsung Electronics' ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM CompetitorData WHERE competitor_id = 1;
SELECT competitor_name, revenue FROM CompetitorData ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT competitor_name, market_share FROM CompetitorData WHERE market_share > 10;
SELECT competitor_id, competitor_name, product_sold FROM CompetitorData;
SELECT opportunity_name, estimated_profit FROM ProductOpportunities WHERE estimated_profit <= 5000;
SELECT competitor_id, competitor_name, revenue FROM CompetitorData WHERE revenue > 10000;
SELECT competitor_name, market_share, product_sold FROM CompetitorData WHERE market_share < 20;
SELECT * FROM CompetitorData ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT competitor_id, competitor_name FROM CompetitorData WHERE competitor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT competitor_name, revenue, product_sold FROM CompetitorData WHERE product_sold BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT competitor_name, revenue FROM competitors WHERE competitor_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM market_opportunities WHERE opportunity_id > 5;
SELECT competitor_name, revenue FROM competitors WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM competitors ORDER BY competitor_name DESC
SELECT competitor_name, revenue FROM competitors WHERE revenue >= 100000 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT competitor_name, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM competitors GROUP BY competitor_name ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM market_opportunities WHERE opportunity_description LIKE '%new%'
SELECT company_name, product_name, revenue FROM competitors;
SELECT study_location, study_date, researcher_name FROM market_research ORDER BY study_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, target_market, competitive_advantage FROM product_opportunities WHERE opportunity_identified = true;
SELECT product_name, target_market, marketing_channels FROM positioning_strategies WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
SELECT company_name, market_segment, revenue FROM competitors WHERE revenue > 100000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM competitors WHERE revenue > 100000 ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name, revenue FROM competitors WHERE market_segment = 'Technology' ORDER BY revenue ASC;
SELECT * FROM market_research WHERE study_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY study_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, target_market, SUBSTRING(competitive_advantage, 1, 50) AS short_advantage FROM product_opportunities WHERE opportunity_identified = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, target_market, marketing_channels[1] AS main_channel FROM positioning_strategies ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Competitors;
SELECT competitor_name, revenue FROM Competitors ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT competitor_name, market_trend FROM Competitors JOIN MarketResearch ON Competitors.competitor_id = MarketResearch.competitor_id WHERE market_trend = 'Growing';
SELECT product_name, marketing_strategy FROM Products JOIN Positioning ON Products.product_id = Positioning.product_id WHERE target_market = 'Youth';
SELECT competitor_name, headquarters_location FROM Competitors;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT competitor_name, revenue FROM Competitors ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE category LIKE '%elect%' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT competitor_name, market_trend, market_share FROM Competitors c JOIN MarketResearch mr ON c.competitor_id = mr.competitor_id WHERE market_share > 0.5;
